short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds an email button to the toolbar which allows you to email the page link using your default mail client or Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to send the URL with the selected text by email or Gmail quickly.
This extension adds an email button to the toolbar and then you can send the current page URL quickly to someone using your default email client/application.

You can set a default email address if you have the habit to send this kind of message to the same email.

The selected text on the current page is added inside the email.

The 2021 update integrate the right-click shortcut to fire the action "send this page URL by email"
